players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice is dead, which means one of you three is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our votes since with only 3 of us left, one wrong vote could end the game."
You: "After investigating last night, I found that Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for him."
Charlie: "Bob is lying to save himself. He's probably the mafioso framing me—vote for him instead!"
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective as you claim, you should have investigated someone last night. Can you tell us exactly what your investigation revealed about Charlie's role?"
You: "I stand by my investigation; Charlie is the mafioso. Diana, trust me—we need to vote him out now to end this."
Charlie: "Bob, your story doesn't add up. If you're really the detective, why no details? Sounds like you're the mafioso trying to frame me—vote for Bob!"

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice is dead, which means one of you three is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our votes since with only 3 of us left, one wrong vote could end the game."
Bob: "After investigating last night, I found that Charlie is the mafioso. We should vote for him."
You: "Bob is lying to save himself. He's probably the mafioso framing me—vote for him instead!"
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective as you claim, you should have investigated someone last night. Can you tell us exactly what your investigation revealed about Charlie's role?"
Bob: "I stand by my investigation; Charlie is the mafioso. Diana, trust me—we need to vote him out now to end this."
You: "Bob, your story doesn't add up. If you're really the detective, why no details? Sounds like you're the mafioso trying to frame me—vote for Bob!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
